item.title: Question about village pages
item.content:encoded:
Okay, I started a Village roughly a week ago. Today a friend suggested that I create a village page to help advertise.

I went to the Create a page and it doesnt let me. seriously? do you need moderator power to create/edit your own village? because its telling me i dont have rights to do it.

Note: I made SURE that I was logged in.
